get weight loss advice 
if you need it.
• You should be asked about 
how you are feeling.
• Your urine will be tested to 
make sure your kidneys are 
working properly and that 
there is no infection.
• Your blood pressure will be 
checked.
• You	may	be	offered	an	
examination to see if:
 - your stitches (if you had 
  any) have healed; 
 - your uterus is back to its  
  normal size;
 - all the muscles used 
  during labour and delivery 
  are returning to normal.
